ERR.NO_MORE_CALLS: The current model's conversation limit has been reached. Please switch to another model or upgrade your plan.
ERR.API_TIMEOUT: API service request timed out. Please try again later.
ERR.NO_UID: No user found. This might be a server-side issue. Please log out and try again. If the problem persists, contact the administrator.
ERR.VIP_ONLY: This model requires a higher-tier plan. Please switch to another model or upgrade your plan.
ERR.NO_MORE_TOKEN: The current model's conversation limit has been reached. Please switch to another model or upgrade your plan.
ERR.NO_MORE_DEVICE: Device limit exceeded. Your current device limit is {deviceLimit}. To increase the number of devices, please upgrade your plan. Note that different browsers are counted as separate devices.
ERR.CONNECTION_FAILED: Failed to connect to the server. Please try again later.
ERR.INVALID_EMAIL: Invalid email address. Please check your email and try again.
ERR.UNKNOWN: An error occurred: {messageErrorType}. Please try again!
ERR.PASSWORD_ERROR: Wrong password. Please check your password and try again.

hero.title: UUGPT Makes Multi-Model AI Conversations More Efficient
hero.subtitleLine1: Integrates GPT, Gemini, Claude, and more models
hero.subtitleLine3: Unified access on mobile & PC, no VPN needed, direct connection in mainland China.

multiModel.title: Multi-Model AI Conversations
multiModel.desc: Easily switch between GPT, Gemini, Claude, and more models, covering academic writing, programming assistance, and creative generation, all in one platform to meet your diverse needs.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.desc: Uses HTTPS encryption, cloud storage for chat records with the option to delete. Anonymous users leave no trace after clearing cookies, ensuring your privacy and data security.

flexiblePricing.title: Flexible Pricing + First Month Discount
flexiblePricing.desc: Offers free, basic, and premium plans. New users pay only $1 for the first month, allowing you to experience UUGPT's powerful features at a very low cost.

cloudStorage.title: Cloud Storage
cloudStorage.desc: Chat records are stored in the cloud, accessible across devices, preventing data loss and allowing you to view and manage anytime, anywhere.

multiModal.title: Multi-Modal Features
multiModal.desc: Supports sending images, PDFs, txt, Word, and other formats, meeting more scenario requirements and enhancing communication efficiency.

intelligentSearch.title: Intelligent Search
intelligentSearch.desc: UUGPT can be integrated into third-party search engines for AI-driven search, helping you quickly locate key information.

reviewer1.name: Jondier Junior
reviewer1.comment: “The multi-model switching in UUGPT is really convenient, and the first month discount is such a great deal. I recommended it to my friends, and they all love it!”

reviewer2.name: Paul Edison
reviewer2.comment: “The options from anonymous to premium are very flexible. Cloud storage and encryption methods make me feel secure, definitely recommend.”

reviewer3.name: Erik Bass
reviewer3.comment: “The interface is clean, and the response speed is fast, especially in mainland China with no lag. It’s really helpful for me, as I need to communicate across languages.”

cta.title: Experience UUGPT Now
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users and experience more efficient and convenient AI conversation management, easily tackling learning, work, and creative scenarios!

footer.seoText: Multi-Model AI Conversations, GPT, Gemini, Claude, 21 Languages Support, Cloud Storage, Encrypted Security, Flexible Pricing, Direct Connection in Mainland China, AI-assisted Writing, Creative Generation, Programming Assistance, AIGC

login.title: Login to uuGPT
login.emailPlaceholder: Login or register with your email
login.emailFormatError: Please enter a valid email address
login.emailError: Please enter a valid email address
login.invalidPasswordCharacterError: Contains illegal characters, only letters and numbers are allowed
login.passwordLengthError: The length must be between 6 and 24 characters
login.agreeTermsError: Please agree to the agreement first
login.forgotPasswordError: The forgot password function is not available at the moment. Please try again later.
login.forgotSuccess: A password reset email has been sent. Please check your email for instructions on resetting your password.
login.enterVerificationCode: Please enter the 6-digit verification code sent to {email}. It is valid for 5 minutes.
login.verificationCodeSentSuccess: Verification code sent. Please check your email.
login.invalidVerificationCodeError: Please enter a valid verification code
login.setPasswordText: Please set your login password. Use 6-24 characters.
login.resetPasswordText: Please set a new login password. Use 6-24 characters.

app.title: uuGPT - Multi-Model AI Chat Assistant | Integrates GPT/Claude/DeepSeek/Gemini/Qwen
app.description: uuGPT is an intelligent chat platform integrating top AI models, featuring one-click Google login. Free access to GPT-4 mini. Subscribe Pro to unlock GPT-3.5/Claude 3.7 and more advanced models for writing, coding, translation, and more.
app.keywords: AI Chat,ChatGPT,GPT Chat,Claude AI,DeepSeek,Gemini,Google Login,Maxthon Login,Free AI Writing,Multi-Model AI,Smart Assistant,AI Subscription
app.imageSaveHint: This image will expire in 60 minutes. Right-click and save as!
app.linkError: Server connection error. Please try again.
app.noMoreTokens: You do not have enough tokens.
app.promotion: Unlimited Annual Plan for only ${yearPrice} per year. Save ${yearDiscount}!
app.deleteToTheEnd: Delete this message and all subsequent messages
app.gotouugpt: ✨ Need to permanently save chat history or access more advanced AI models?
app.installPrompt: Add uuGPT to your home screen for quick access!

aisystem: Respond in English. Answers must use Markdown format. Only when the answer is complex or requires references, include 1-3 authoritative reference links at the end that are directly relevant and verified sources. Links must be genuine and strongly related to the topic. Simple answers should omit citations entirely.

pricing.choosePlanDescription: Choose flexibly based on your needs and enjoy powerful AI services
pricing.planDescription: Your subscription determines the AI services and features you can access.
pricing.freePlanDesc: For basic scenarios and personal use
freePlanFeatures: Switch freely between large models in the same conversation
AI-powered writing, translation, and summarization driven by basic models
Privacy protection, anonymous use without login
2 login devices (different browsers are counted as different devices)
Limited monthly usage of basic models (GPT-4o mini, gemini 2.0 flash lite, DeepSeek V3)
pricing.basicPlanDesc: Suitable for most daily use cases
basicPlanFeatures: Includes all features of the Free Plan
5 login devices (different browsers are counted as different devices)
More models available (gemini 2.0 flash, DeepSeek R1)
Coming soon: file upload and voice input
pricing.proPlanDesc: Meets in-depth usage needs with top priority
proPlanFeatures: Includes all features of Free and Basic Plans
10 login devices (different browsers are counted as different devices)
Additional 4 million tokens per month for advanced models (GPT o3-mini, Gemini 1.5 pro, Claude 3.5 haiku, etc.)
40,000 tokens per month for trial access to cutting-edge models (GPT o1, Claude 3.7 sonnet, etc.)
Coming soon: exclusive access to more features
pricing.priceComparisonDesc: Compared to subscribing to GPT, Claude, and Gemini separately, our aggregated service can save you more!
pricing.priceComparisonConclusion: One-time payment, enjoy multiple AI services, no need for repeated subscriptions, easily saving you time and money!
pricing.faqQ1: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
pricing.faqA1: Yes, you can cancel or adjust your subscription plan in your account settings at any time. Cancellation will take effect in the next billing cycle.
pricing.faqA2: We provide an electronic receipt after each successful payment. If necessary, please check your account center or contact customer service.
pricing.paymentProcessingMessage: Please wait, your payment is being processed...
pricing.paymentFailureMessage: Payment failed. Please check your payment information and try again.
pricing.paymentLinkError: Failed to get payment link. Please try again later.
pricing.priceNote: One subscription for GPT-4, Claude, and Gemini Pro
pricing.trialDescription: Cancel anytime during trial with no charges
